description: In response to appeals from a Tennessee trucking company and a Republican lawmaker from Tennessee, the E.P.A. administrator, Scott Pruitt, has moved to roll back an agency rule intended to curb air pollution from freight-hauling diesel-powered trucks. Here is a look at the documents behind the debate.
title: Money, Politics and Pollution: Inside a Trump-Era Loophole
title_page: Money, Politics and Pollution: Inside a Trump-Era Loophole - The New York Times
